name: Lost & Blind
description:
=========

English

=========

Made for Nusantara Game Jam: Perdana

Lost & Blind

A blind little boy must fight monsters to make his life more peaceful.

Control

- walk [arrow]

- jump [Z]

- attack [X]

- shoot light ball [C]

- super vision [A]

credit

- MFauzan (Programmer & Audio)

- Kard Kardus (Artist)

=========

Indonesia

=========

Dibuat untuk Nusantara Game Jam: Perdana

Lost & Blind

Seorang anak kecil yang buta harus melawan monster agar hidupnya lebih tenang.

Kontrol

- berjalan [arrow]

- lompat [Z]

- menyerang [X]

- menembak bola cahaya [C]

- penglihatan super [A]

kredit

- MFauzan (Programmer & Audio)

- Kard Kardus (Artist)
